etomica.util.numerical

Class AkimaSplineSmoother

  • java.lang.Object
    • etomica.util.numerical.AkimaSplineSmoother
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AkimaSplineSmootherDy

    public class AkimaSplineSmoother
extends java.lang.Object
    Optimization algorithm which attempts to smooth data without moving any point far from its original location.
